definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Of course the argument can be repeated with regards to sub-atomic particles.
sentences.chinese: 當然，這個論證同樣適用於亞原子粒子。

sentences.english: These atoms are in turn composed of sub-atomic particles.
sentences.chinese: 這些原子又是由亞原子粒子組成的。

sentences.english: Nanotechnology is the science of materials at the molecular or subatomic level.
sentences.chinese: 納米技術是關於分子或亞原子層次上的材料科學。
